title: Here’s A Peek At What You’ll Learn…

description.title: The FoodBodyLove Summit will teach you WHY
reasons: ...punishing yourself when you skip the gym
description.conclusion: is taking you further away from where you want to be.
description.subtitle:
Through solid expert advice learn HOW to change your relationship to food 
so you stop feeling possessed near potato chips.

topics.title: Psychology
facts: • Train your brain to let go of destructive habits
• The unseen connection between emotions and eating
• Accept yourself at any size or shape

topics.title: Nutrition
facts: • Work with your metabolism so it works for you, not against you
• Understand the principles of intuitive eating and how to apply them to your daily life
• Find out what’s driving your binges and cravings

topics.title: Self-Compassion
facts: • Identify ways to bring more love and kindness into your life
• Skills you can use when you’re beating yourself up after that pint of Ben and Jerry’s

topics.title: Mindfulness
facts: • Reduce anxiety and become more present in your daily life
• Slow down and learn to truly enjoy your meals
• Stop the constant comparing and judgement

topics.title: Energy Healing
facts: • Find new ways to strengthen your mind body connection
• Learn about Eastern energy systems of healing
• Rid yourself of toxic beliefs with the Emotional Freedom Technique

epilogue: Plus inspiring success stories from people just like you!
